---
title: "11_DataCleaning"
output: html_document
---
```{r}

source("00_requirements.R")

the_text <- readLines("Percy Jackson 1.txt")
the_text[1:30]
length(the_text)

the_text <- str_trim(the_text)
the_text[1:30]

the_text <- the_text[ nchar(the_text) > 0 ]
the_text[1:30]

cat(str_flatten(the_text[1:20], collapse = " "))

text_string <- str_flatten(the_text, collapse = " ")

text_string <- str_to_lower(text_string)

text_main <- str_sub(text_string)

text_main <- str_replace_all(text_main, "[■©:.!?”“—(),;’‘_]", "")

text_main <- str_replace_all(text_main, "[0-9]", "")

text_main

save(text_main, file = "12_DataSaving.RData")


```

```{r}

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(textclean)
harry_potter <- read_file("Harry Potter All Books.txt")

hp_clean <- harry_potter %>%
  tolower() %>%
  replace_non_ascii() %>%
  str_squish()

hp_df <- tibble(text = hp_clean)
hp_words <- hp_df %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

```
